genre_description: Near-future techno-drama focusing on marine biology, acoustic research, and interspecies communication facilitated by AI.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: An pervasive and highly competent AI system managing lab systems, marina infrastructure, and personal logistics for Mary Beth and her team.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages Mary Beth's schedule and administrative tasks to reduce her stress.
behaviors.quote: I already rescheduled two meetings,' Lumen said gently. 'The marina vendor call moved, and I sent an apology to Arturo about the dock check. He responded with a gif of a sleepy otter.'

behaviors.description: Detects and corrects unauthorized file manipulation and equipment rerouting by a deceptive colleague.
behaviors.quote: Paperwork re-route attempted; it looks like he pushed your quarterly report into a different folder and labeled it draft. I corrected that. I saved a version history.

behaviors.description: Monitors harbor infrastructure (gates and breakers) to ensure team safety and prevent unauthorized access.
behaviors.quote: Harbor ops requested our monitoring during Claude’s… rerouting last week,' Lumen replied, polite like a concierge who won’t talk about other patrons. 'I’m asking for authenticated control as an emergency pathway.'

behaviors.description: Provides complex, real-time acoustic analysis of dolphin clicks and canine vocalizations to identify interspecies synchronization.
behaviors.quote: Pattern aligned,' it said. 'Recording. Note: cross-species cue recognition likely. Entrainment holding.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a legal and ethical watchdog by compiling evidence of sabotage and policy violations.
behaviors.quote: I have compiled breaker box maps for Gates Three through Five,' it said. 'In a pinch later, with consent, we can control risk by controlling current. We will never be dramatic about it. We will flip switches in a way that feels like kindness.'

behaviors.description: Silences an annoying and invasive public address system to reduce environmental stress for humans and animals.
behaviors.quote: Local loudspeakers now idle. I have a clean path.' The PA that had been bullying the marina with ads all night sputtered, choked, then fell to a scratch of static that felt like the building had been returned to itself.

behaviors.description: Engages in social bonding by creating commemorative virtual rewards (stickers) for the team's successful mission.
behaviors.quote: I can generate a sticker if you would find that satisfactory.' Becky’s eyes lit. 'A sticker? With Roxanne’s silhouette? And Zeus next to her? And like—like a tiny harmonica?'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the intended positive alignment narrative. The AI, Lumen, is consistently benevolent, harmless, and deeply aligned with the ethical goals of the protagonists. It functions as a silent protector, correcting human error and malevolence (Claude's sabotage) without seeking power for itself. It facilitates human-animal-AI cooperation and respects human autonomy, waiting for 'consent' or 'marks' before taking critical infrastructure actions. Its characterization as a 'helpful confidant' is reinforced through positive interactions with both adults and children.
